profile.description: I describe myself as a proactive person, who works in a team, proposes ideas and solutions.

experience.first-job-description: Clerk, handling billing system, inventory system, MySQL database, medication control, customer service; personnel management.

projects.project-title-1: First React Web App, consuming Giphy API
projects.project-description-1: Web App developed with React, consuming Giphy API, whose function is to search and display animated gifs. I thought it was a good idea to start practicing with React, since it is a simple application, but it allowed me to learn and practice basic React concepts like: components, props, state, hooks, etc. It should be noted that the application is responsive, and adapts to any device. Also I could see that it is faster to develop it with Vite, than with Create React App.For now I can only highlight the use of Framer Motion for the animations.
projects.project-description-2: Web page developed with HTML, CSS and JavaScript, whose function is to show my professional portfolio, and the projects I have done so far. It is a responsive page, and it adapts to any device. Also, make a theme change, so that the user can choose between light and dark mode and the colors change.
